I also do all the programming on the register systems, safes, ATM machines, and phone card machine.

lender.name: Rabir
lender.loan_because: I loan because people in those countries deserve so much more than they actually get. Unlike us they appreciate everything they get even if its "just" food. And they DONT complain. They accept life like it is and always do their best because they have to in order to survive.We don't realize in which luxury we actually live in with a shelter, gas, electricity and FOOD (!). So why dont give people like us, the chance to a life like us.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: it will help out many people who think they can't make it far in a world that has changed so much. Most people in the first world don't see the point in giving out a loan to someone that is as poor as everyone on here, but if you look at all the people who have paid back all the money then you would see it's worth the $25. Then as time goes on you will lend more and change the lives of many people.

lender.name: Maria Chiarlitti

lender.occupational_info: We provide currency exchange rate information and services, including rate information to Kiva. We are happy to be able to support the service. (http://www.kiva.org/about/supporters#xe)

lender.name: Janet

lender.occupational_info: I look after an office furniture company front showroom, meet lot's of interesting people and love my fellow employees . I am very lucky to be working around beautiful furniture.

lender.name: Andrian

lender.name: Sacha
lender.loan_because: I believe it is our duty to ensure that everyone has access to services that allow them to make the most of the enterprise they have shown in their businesses. In this difficult economic climate, it is more difficult to obtain credit, especially for those deemed high-risk. I believe that by back-filling loans to these borrowers I can mediate some of the risk taken by the microfinanciers, meaning that they can continue to provide credit to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor.

lender.occupational_info: As a youth pastor, I work to help young people and adults follow the ways of Jesus and love him with all their heart, mind, and strength. I also spend a few days each week working in the schools (mainly with ages 12 to 18) as a substitute teacher, where I teach everything from art to chemistry.

lender.occupational_info: I co-founded an investment management business that manages several billion US dollars for clients world wide.

lender.name: Malouh
lender.loan_because:
We need more resources to further improve our work. For this we need your ajuda.Precisamos safety equipment, transportation, photography, to the workshops and lectures. We count on your support.
Terra da PAZ Group and ecofotografia sites: www.terradapaz.org www.ecofotografias.fot.br
lender.occupational_info:
The Land of PEACE program has as basic purposes the inclusion of children and youngster aged from 6 to 21 years old , in a process of sensitization, self-valuation and self-discipline, attained through the art of ceramics in multiple workshops and some other complementary workings.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jLgiAjF6zfo
Echo Photography is the means of environment sensitization developed by the Ecolambelambe project in its workshops. It stimulates the care with Nature and environment and historical research.
Instrumentality and Ceramic Molding: the participant learns how to mold its form, making clear his authorship in the process.
Mosaic: it harmonizes that which is the depredated, broken, in shards, harmonizing the new image in a new expressive form.
Painting of Panels: Ceramic on tiles, floors and small flagstones, showing the expression and disclosing, through the use of colors, the participants relation with the world, his conquest of PEACE.
Ambient sensitization: we work encouraging the use, in depth, of perception, through exercises and tricks that, through the art or of environment, keep us in touch with the here and now, and our necessities and responsibilities in taking care of the environment around us, either in its transformation or preservation.
Lectures for the community: we dedicate ourselves mainly to the necessity of Art as a development of the Human Being and to the Lectures on Environment Sensitization. We deliver constant lectures approaching subjects of interest, necessary to the improvement of the quality of life in the community, and also on subjects related to the work in itself, developed by the members of the workshops.
News Letter All Blue one: A weekly newsletter, where we report the performances of Land of the PEACE and the other projects it generates, such as Arts of the Curupira (Environmental Education). The works developed in all the workshops aim to the Revitalization Project, which renovates dammaged public parks and public spaces, deteriorating or about to deteriorate, transforming the space of nobody into a space for all. This work is directed by the painter Odilon Cavalcanti and the photographer Malouh Gualberto. Website: www.artesdatraca.com.br in connection, via link, with the project www.terradapaz.org and http://terradapazcultural.blogspot.com (cultural actions and expositions of art and Ecophotos) where more information can be accessed. We are sure to be able to contribute socially, not only through the activities of social responsability, but also as far as the aspect of valuation of public spaces and environmental sensitization are concerned. We want to show a little of the makings", in a proposal of solidarity and creative human development that the Program Land of the Peace contains. Therefore, we invite you to pay a call to our site and to give support to our initiative.
Tel 551144854061
email:
terradapazorm@terra.com.br
ecolambelambe@terra.com.br
Skype: ecolambelambe
Cell phone: 5511 97071362
Ecolambelambe Project/ Echophotographies (Ecofotografias.com) Please kindly acknowledge receipt
Ecolambelambe Project is born from the need to show through photographic records the exuberance of nature, its forests and its grandeur, giving support to those who preserve it.
The magnificence of its environment goes far beyond our basic needs for water and oxygen, but it faces the danger of destruction, the so talked about global warming, entirely due to human callousness.
Based on the need for awareness of the Human Being, Ecolambelambe Project spreads the seed of ecofotografia by showing details of Musa, his priority in preservation. Another way is to publicize, through its exhibitions, sustainability and ecotourism projects that provide development and conservation, walking hand in hand in several regions, such as the Vale do Ribeira, in So Paulo state, with its marvellous caves and grottos.
Philosophy
The forest itself is a living being, and we see ourselves as belonging to it. The forest is not our property, at our dispposal. And this has been our challenge.
Ecolambelambe Project tries to translate into its images some of this magnitude, which has much to teach us and goes far beyond mere fads or human needs. We are aware of the need to respect everything that surround us. We advocate the the use of ecophotography as a tool and a stimulus to the ever present and continuous care of the environment, by which we encourage self esteem, authorship and creative and sensitive actions.
Thus, the Ecofotografias of Ecolambelambe Project are meant to promote conservation and awareness, inherent in the process triggered by the photo and its language. This is precisely our task in our exhibitions and workshops.
We also sell ecophotos as a means to provide continuity to our research and our work. It is, therefore, an environment project, and thus we are building a space for sustainability. Please access the blog of our present exhibit: http://trilhasdoolhar.blogspot.com . Our main site: www.ecofotografias.com
Action
Lectures and workshops ecofotografias meant for field monitors and multipliers.
Workshops for Schools and the Elderly.
You Tube-Publication Ecolambelambe. Slide show produced by park officials
Channel created videos for neighborhood associations, monitors and people who can replicate the project.
Exhibition of ecofotographies by Malouh Gualberto and Team. Odilon Cavalcanti, plastic and graphic artist, is the curator. Settings by architect Cesar FEDAT. Jaime Maciel is the consulting biologist and environmentalist.
Exhibition of ceramic pannels (paintings), an artistic look at the Atlantic Forest, southeast Brazil.
Mini exhibits in shop-centers with great flow of people.
Exhibition in Cultural Centers and Universities

The project has already more than 40.000 photographic records of the parks of So Paulo State, (Conservation Units) plus over 10,000 photos of Serra da Cantareira (So Paulo) and Amazon.
We are currently doing research on the trails of Portuguese pioneers, Indians and Africans in the Atlantic forest, southeast Brazil. It is our intention to present the results of our research in Portugal, next year

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupational_info: I manage the risks of natural catastrophes (like floods, tsunamis, earthquake ) for my company

lender.name: Chellis
lender.loan_because: my humanist values place a responsibility on me to assist others. The easy way out is to sigh and say, "It's God's will, but I'll pray for you." Comfortable, but wrong. No, it is our will, and so it is also our responsibility--to perform good acts, not just think them.
lender.occupational_info: Seriously? It's nothing more than the Golden Rule in action: Treat others how you would wish to be treated. If you are in trouble do you want someone to pray to their imaginary being and go on with their comfortable lives? Or would you rather they leave their comfort zone and actually reach out a hand to help you? (Without also trying to persuade you that you must believe in their imaginary being.)

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help other people make a better life for themselves and their families. I believe women will change the world.

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Others can use the little I can offer to make a difference to their financial situation and help make their lives a little better.
lender.occupational_info: Manage homes and properties for a government department.

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupational_info: I sell and install heating and cooling units in homes and small business.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life. This is just one way of expressing my thanks for that.

lender.name: Jon and Susan
lender.loan_because: we are always looking for ways to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Jon is an engineer and I work in healthcare

lender.name: Ruth
lender.occupational_info: As a music therapist, I use various types of music to improve the quality of life of a variety of individuals, primarily elderly persons with health issues.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: microfinance is awesome.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit K-12 reading textbooks. I try to make them relevant, engaging and smart so kids today are as inspired to learn as I once was.

lender.name: Michle
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading and writing to high school aged students.

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-finance

lender.name: Will
lender.occupational_info: I am a cognitive scientist, currently involved in research investigating ideals of rational decision making. I'm particularly interested in PDP models that describe the role of emotion in science.

lender.name: Joeri
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I help make computer programs that allow large corporations to run their business more efficiently.

lender.name: Bette
lender.loan_because: I hope to help industrious people around the world make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Since I no longer work, I can devote more time to volunteer work.

lender.name: Sophie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people live a life that I have
lender.occupational_info: I am a 3rd grader.

lender.name: Blue Marlin
lender.loan_because: We want to share our good fortune with others

lender.name: Klaus
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help others to help themselves.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. Because people are supposed to help each other...aren't they? Because I have been at rock bottom and there isn't a lot to recommend that; if I can help someone else out of that space I am all for it.
lender.occupational_info: My 'real' job is challenging, but in the grand scheme of things has no social or longlasting importance. My passion is making jewellery and I also own my own jewellery company, working from my home studio to bring beauty to the world.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I got big heart for the needy, and I love entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: My son got me started with a gift certificate for Christmas

lender.occupational_info: I teach computer applications to high schoolers
